Body:
shape = 1000, 10
X = 2 * np.ones(shape)
def func(X):
    assert X.shape[0] > 0
    return X ** 2, X - 1
d, idx = _chunk_kneighbors(func, X, batch_size=batch_size)
assert_allclose(d, 4 * np.ones(shape))
assert_allclose(idx, 1 * np.ones(shape))
pytest.mark.parametrize('batch_size', [1, 101, 100])
